remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件 [取消] 按鈕時按下後，但結束前，插入或編輯模式。The control raises the event when the Cancel button is clicked, but before exiting insert or edit mode. (取消按鈕定義不按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Cancel") 可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件，例如停止取消作業，會讓項目不想要的事件處理方法狀態。(A Cancel button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Cancel") This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法。A object is passed to the event-handling method. 此物件可讓您判斷索引的項目包含引發事件的 [取消] 按鈕。This object enables you to determine the index of the item that contains the Cancel button that raised the event. 您也可以判斷哪一個作業已取消。You can also determine what operation was canceled. 若要停止取消作業，請設定屬性`true`。To stop the cancel operation, set the property to `true`. 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件，以顯示一則訊息，使用者取消中的 insert 或 update 作業時控制項。The following example shows how to use the object to display a message when the user cancels the insert or update operation in a control. 物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以便事件。The object is passed to the event-handling method for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例包含一個文字方塊，可接受使用者輸入，可能會造成安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
